global: int:j;
void main(){
  int j = 2;
  int x = 0;
  int y = 5;
  int z = 1;

  do{
    int z = z+z;
  }
  while(x<y);
  print(z);

  void loop(){
    int t = 0;
    int q = 5;
    do{
      int j = j+j;
    }
    while(t<q);
  };

  int loop1(int x, int y){
    int result = 1;
    do{
      int result = result + result;
    }
    while (x < y);
    return result;
  };


  call void loop()
  print(j);
  int result = call int loop1(0, 10);
  print(result);
};
